summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the sale of land for mixed-use development in the I-90 Redevelopment Project area; authorizing the sale of Dearborn-Hiawatha Parcel 2 to Icon Architecture, Ltd; authorizing the Director of the Office of Housing to execute, deliver, and administer the contract for sale of land, to enter into phased closings and execute and deliver deeds for each lot, directing that the proceeds from the sale be deposited to the Urban Renewal Close Out Sub-account and the Program Income Revenue Account; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
